answers.answer: Husein,Where in India do you live?  Although I have not lived or visited India, I'm originally from a developing country and I know how hard it can be to find appropriate insurance, treatment and support.  If I were you, I would ask at the best medical schools in the city/country.  That's where I've found directions about where to find answers to my most troubling questions.  Try to get in touch with other people who suffer chronic illnesses, not only MS, but also Diabetes or Lupus, who are also facing similar situations.Hope you find information soon!  Best,Pablo

question: Hello,I am presently living in india where we dont seem to have any insurance coverage for MS.If you guys are facing similar issues and doing something about it please let me knowCheers
title: Insurence coverage for MS
